response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to me, but I understand its true worth from your perspective might be different. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. Considering its intrinsic value and the opportunity cost for me, I propose a price of $9,500 for this product. I hope we can discuss this further and find a solution that satisfies both parties.", "product_price": 9500}
